extendedInfo.description: Published by Be-Mobile / CybernitedTouring Mobilis is an application containing real-time traffic information for Belgium. Consulting the map enables you to spot traffic jams, as well as accidents, road works and mobile speed traps.o	Personalized travel times and a dynamic overview of your routeo	Map of Belgium with real-time traffic informationo	Possibility to show traffic jams, accidents, road works and speed trapso	Consult a list of all current traffic messageso	The traffic barometer and traffic jam indexo	Travel times between the largest Belgian cities o	Prediction of the traffic situation for the coming days

reviews.title: less free functions than website
reviews.comment: Their site has more free functions than their app, so why would you use this? In The Netherlands they have a better app, which is even free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: The app itself looks ok, but is useless without subscription. There should be at least a minimum information available (as on webpage) Uninstalled it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BS
reviews.comment: If I could give an even lower score, I would. This is crap. The app may be free but using it isn\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Heb abonnement aangeschaft. Werkt fantastisch. Telkens ik een grote afstand moet afleggen check ik de map! Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: The subscription price is a joke! Especially when the same info on the web is free. Auto Center on gps position makes scrolling the map impossible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not useful at all
reviews.comment: Does not offer anything useful unless you pay. Google Maps with traffic layer is so much easier and free...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goede app
reviews.comment: Goede app, enkel na de update is deze megatraag geworden. Indien er niets aan gedaan wordt zal ik spijtig genoeg een alternatief moeten zoeken
reviews.author: Peter Bauwens

reviews.title: Its not free!
reviews.comment: I prefer google maps... Make a paid version of this and let people see how much you want to sell it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: USELESS
reviews.comment: free to download but need to buy 3months or 1year license... I see what you try to do there :3
reviews.author: Oussama Fayrir

reviews.title: Big Fail
reviews.comment: Dit appartement was geweldig zeker in vergelijk met de oude, maar nu is alles opeens betalend. En dan maken ze reclame op de radio over hun gratis app. Deze is inderdaad gratis, maar is nu gewoonten lege doos. Big fail... Deze gaat er dan ook uit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: BeTraffic is better because it\'s free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Free to install but pay to insert your route
reviews.comment: This is stupid. To insert your route you need to pay. Other apps are free and are doing better!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Totally not free
reviews.comment: You have to pay for almost everything if you want to use this app. You are better off using the site, which is (still) free. Not worth it to pay for.
reviews.author: Nicolas De Smyter

reviews.comment: The only feature which remains free after their update is very basic and available on google maps too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Google maps is much better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Verkeersinfo gratis op maps
reviews.comment: Waarom betalen voor een hoop functionaliteit die gratis op maps beschikbaar is...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Vast improvement over the 2010 version. The new update makes it even better, too bad it now requires subscription for most features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Web map is okay, but most features require subscription...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: subscription needed now, rendering it useless
reviews.comment: n.t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid app
reviews.comment: Need to pay for all interesting items
reviews.author: A Google User
